mapper.update: update ALR_FILE_UPLOAD_RECORD set PACKAGE_NAME = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_COUNT = #{fileCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPLOAD_DATE = #{uploadDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACKAGE_TYPE = #{packageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BATCH_ID = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select BATCH_ID, PACKAGE_NAME, FILE_COUNT, UPLOAD_DATE, STATUS, OPERATOR, UPDATE_DATE, IS_VALID, PACKAGE_TYPE from ALR_FILE_UPLOAD_RECORD where BATCH_ID = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select BATCH_ID, PACKAGE_NAME, FILE_COUNT, UPLOAD_DATE, STATUS, OPERATOR, UPDATE_DATE, IS_VALID, PACKAGE_TYPE from ALR_FILE_UPLOAD_RECORD
